Text:
ERROR

If anyone get the error "GameName.RWG" or any kind of[it was my tiny mistake when i made installer] than here is the solution.

Point to the shortcut on the desktop and right clik it and go to properties and click on "find target" this option will take u to the program direcotry. now point to "Gamename.exe" and again right clikc it and send to the desktop [creat shortcut] now u can play from desktop icon.

akashneo
